name: Young Souls
summary:
"People call them outcasts. Screw people. 
 
From The Arcade Crew (Blazing Chrome, Dark Devotion) and 1P2P (Inside My Radio - winner of Ludem Dare 23,) comes a touching and exciting new tale about life, family, adventure, and saving the world: Young Souls 
 
Young Souls draws you in with its distinct art direction but keeps you playing via a deeply narrative-driven RPG beat-em-up that features clever crossover mechanics."
storyline: "Jenn and Tristan are two teenagers who find themselves suddenly abandoned and without a family until a good-hearted scientist adopts and brings them into his home settled within a small port town. Life in Portsbourgh for Jenn and Tristan proves uneventful. Uneventful, that is, until they uncover a portal to another world which threatens the very existence of life on Earth as we know it. "
